form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, 157 ( Rev. 5-78

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/10/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS San Salvador, El Salvador C.A. FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION eptember 27th. 1988 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at San Salvador El Salvador C.A. NAME AGE SEX Hector Zelaya Funes 74 years Masc. I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY Ministerio ON ES 0554137 April 13/88 del Interior I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: San Salvador C.A. CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: X Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): CERTIFY THAT UNDERSTAND THE PURPOSE OF THE MEDICAL Ex. This man has upper and lower dental plates, REQUIRED TOOT| 83 COMPLET AND and he has no clinical evidence that FORMATION ON The FORM REFERS TO ME, he suffe S from Aids Chest X-ray report Negative Sept. 26/88 Victor M. Esquivel from Dr. V.D.R.L. non reactive Sept 27/88 Mauricio E . Ponce Blood serological report from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) Antibodies HIV Negative Mauricio E. Ponce Dr. ADALBERTO GOMEZ MIRA from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT Medical Examiner 50157-102 Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE : 1987 o - 188-920 Dept. of State
